substitution.copyText: To groan and sweat under a weary life?
The [?r] unidiscover’d Country, from whole born
No traveller returns, puzzles te will
substitution.amendedText: No traveller returns,) puzzles te will;

substitution.copyText: Soft you now, the fair Ophelia and lose the name of action
substitution.amendedText: Soft the fair Ophelia and lose the name of action

substitution.copyText: for virtue cannot so ??? our old flock but we shall relish of it:
substitution.amendedText: for virtue cannot so our old flock but we shall relish of it:

substitution.copyText: than the force of honestly can translate beauty to his likeness
substitution.amendedText: than the force of honestly can translate beauty into its likeness

substitution.copyText: for virtue cannot so ??? our old flock but we shall relish of it:
substitution.amendedText: for virtue cannot so ??? our old flock, but we shall relish of it:

substitution.copyText: but now the time gives it proof.
substitution.amendedText: but now the time gives it proof.--

substitution.copyText: You should have not believed me for vertue cannot so evacuate our old stock but we shall rellish of it: I love you not.
substitution.amendedText: You should have not believed me for vertue cannot so inoculate our old stock, but we shall rellish of it: I love you not.
